documentation.text:
@title EHRRegistry
 @dev Manages user roles, health record hashes, and access permissions on the blockchain.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the contract owner can perform this action."

arguments.value: Only the contract owner can perform this action.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the contract owner can perform this action."

documentation.text:
@dev Registers a new user (Patient, Doctor, or Admin).
 Can be called by anyone, simulating a public registration form.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only Doctors or Admins can add records."

arguments.value: Only Doctors or Admins can add records.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only Doctors or Admins can add records."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Records can only be added for patients."

arguments.value: Records can only be added for patients.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Records can only be added for patients."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Record with this hash already exists."

arguments.value: Record with this hash already exists.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Record with this hash already exists."

documentation.text:
@dev Adds a new medical record hash to the blockchain.
 Only callable by registered Doctors or Admins.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the patient can grant access to their records."

arguments.value: Only the patient can grant access to their records.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the patient can grant access to their records."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Access can only be granted to Doctors or Admins."

arguments.value: Access can only be granted to Doctors or Admins.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Access can only be granted to Doctors or Admins."

documentation.text:
@dev Grants access to a medical record.
 Only callable by the patient who owns the record.
@dev Checks if a user has access to a specific record.

devdoc.details: Manages user roles, health record hashes, and access permissions on the blockchain.

addRecord(bytes32,address).details: Adds a new medical record hash to the blockchain. Only callable by registered Doctors or Admins.

checkAccess(bytes32,address).details: Checks if a user has access to a specific record.

grantAccess(bytes32,address).details: Grants access to a medical record. Only callable by the patient who owns the record.

registerUser(string,uint8).details: Registers a new user (Patient, Doctor, or Admin). Can be called by anyone, simulating a public registration form.

devdoc.title: EHRRegistry
